text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide 2025connectathonMedicalDevices

DHINandSON2025connectathonMedicalDevices

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://dhin.org/2025Connectathon/ImplementationGuide/2025connectathonMedicalDevices

Implementation Guide for testing Medical Devices

name: DHINandSON2025connectathonMedicalDevices
title: DHIN & SON 2025 connectathon Medical Devices testing
description: Implementation Guide for testing Medical Devices

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: 1-NG-Bundle: Device Audit
resource.description: Bundle profile capturing audit events related to device usage and operations.

resource.name: 2-NG-Bundle: Device Monitoring Session
resource.description: A Bundle capturing device-generated data during a patient monitoring session.

resource.name: 3-NG-Bundle: Device Observation
resource.description: A bundle to capture observations generated by a device including device and device metric context.

resource.name: 4-NG-Bundle: Device Provenance
resource.description: A Bundle capturing provenance data for device data submission or synchronization.

resource.name: 5-NG-Bundle: Device Registration
resource.description: Bundle for registering a new medical device with associated metadata and manufacturer organization.

resource.name: 6-NG-Bundle: Device Task Execution
resource.description: A bundle for coordinating the execution of a task on a device including requester, execution info, and the device involved.

resource.name: Example: Amoxicillin 250mg Capsule
resource.description: An example medication definition for Amoxicillin.

resource.name: Example: AuditEvent for Prescription Access
resource.description: An example AuditEvent recording a practitioner viewing a prescription.

resource.name: Example: Chemistry Analyzer Definition
resource.description: Example DeviceDefinition for a standard clinical chemistry analyzer used in diagnostics.

resource.name: Example: Chemistry Analyzer Device
resource.description: Example of a medical device - Chemistry Analyzer used in laboratory diagnostics.

resource.name: Example: Claim Coverage
resource.description: An example of a patient's insurance coverage details.

resource.name: Example: Communication from Pharmacy to Prescriber
resource.description: An example communication sent from a pharmacist to a doctor requesting clarification on a prescription.

resource.name: Example: Coverage Eligibility Request
resource.description: An example of a patient's request to check insurance service eligibility.

resource.name: Example: Device Audit Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle for auditing device events.

resource.name: Example: Device Monitoring Session
resource.description: An example bundle for a vital signs monitoring session

resource.name: Example: Device Observation Bundle
resource.description: An example of a device sending observation data with associated metadata.

resource.name: Example: Device Provenance Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle showing provenance for a submitted device record.

resource.name: Example: Device Registration Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle used to register a blood chemistry analyzer with regulatory authority.

resource.name: Example: Device Task Execution Bundle
resource.description: Example bundle for tracking execution of a calibration task on a device.

resource.name: Example: Lab Result Observation
resource.description: An example of a laboratory result observation for hemoglobin.

resource.name: Example: Medication Dispense
resource.description: An example of a pharmacist dispensing Amoxicillin 250mg.

resource.name: Example: MedicationRequest
resource.description: An example of an electronic prescription for Amoxicillin.

resource.name: Example: NG DeviceMetric
resource.description: An example metric from a chemistry analyzer measuring glucose level.

resource.name: Example: NG Diagnostic Report
resource.description: An example diagnostic report for a blood chemistry test

resource.name: Example: NG Organization
resource.description: An example of a healthcare facility organization.

resource.name: Example: NG Patient
resource.description: An example instance of a Nigerian patient profile

resource.name: Example: NG Practitioner
resource.description: An example of a Nigerian healthcare practitioner.

resource.name: Example: NG PractitionerRole
resource.description: An example defining the role of a practitioner within a Nigerian healthcare organization.

resource.name: Example: Pharmacy Location
resource.description: An example location representing a pharmacy branch.

resource.name: Example: Prescription Encounter
resource.description: An example encounter related to an ePrescription event.

resource.name: Example: Provenance of ePrescription
resource.description: An example of provenance capturing the author and timestamp of a prescription.

resource.name: Example: Scanned Discharge Summary
resource.description: An example of a scanned discharge summary document reference.

resource.name: Example: Task for Dispensing Prescription
resource.description: A task representing the assignment to dispense a prescription in an ePrescription workflow.

resource.name: NG AuditEvent
resource.description: A profile for logging access and interactions with health data in Nigeria, such as prescriptions or patient records.

resource.name: NG Communication
resource.description: A profile for recording formal communication exchanges such as notifications, clarifications, or feedback in health service delivery.

resource.name: NG Device
resource.description: A profile for medical devices such as chemistry analyzers used in diagnostics.

resource.name: NG DeviceDefinition
resource.description: Profile for defining medical devices such as analyzers, monitors, and diagnostic tools used in Nigerian health facilities.

resource.name: NG DeviceMetric
resource.description: A profile representing a measurement channel or metric produced by a medical device.

resource.name: NG DiagnosticReport
resource.description: A profile representing diagnostic report results in the Nigerian health system.

resource.name: NG DocumentReference
resource.description: A profile for referencing external or internal documents such as lab reports, discharge summaries, prescriptions, or scanned forms.

resource.name: NG Encounter
resource.description: A profile representing patient encounters related to ePrescription.

resource.name: NG Location
resource.description: A profile representing facility locations such as pharmacies, wards, or service points in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG Medication
resource.description: A profile for medications prescribed and dispensed in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG MedicationDispense
resource.description: A profile for recording dispensation of prescribed medications by a pharmacy in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG MedicationRequest
resource.description: A profile for electronic prescriptions issued by Nigerian healthcare providers.

resource.name: NG Observation - Laboratory Result
resource.description: A profile for representing laboratory result observations.

resource.name: NG Organization
resource.description: An organization profile representing healthcare facilities responsible for health services or other types of organizations.

resource.name: NG Patient
resource.description: Nigeria Patient Profile

resource.name: NG Practitioner
resource.description: Profile for a Nigerian Practitioner

resource.name: NG PractitionerRole
resource.description: A profile for defining the role of a practitioner within an organization.

resource.name: NG Provenance
resource.description: A profile for capturing metadata about creation or modification of health data in Nigeria, especially for audit and signature purposes.

resource.name: NG Task
resource.description: A profile for workflow and task management in ePrescription processing.

resource.name: NG-Claim Coverage
resource.description: A profile capturing a patient's insurance coverage details.

resource.name: NG-CoverageEligibilityRequest
resource.description: A profile for checking patient's eligibility for insurance services.

resource.name: NG-Imm Administrative Wards CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective Local Government Areas (LGAs) in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm Facility Type CS
resource.description: A standardized classification system used to describe the type or level of health facility within a healthcare delivery system, based on the scope of services provided, staffing, infrastructure, and administrative role.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender CS
resource.description: The administrative gender of a person.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
resource.description: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

resource.name: NG-Imm HealthFacility Type VS
resource.description: Classification of Nigerian health facilities

resource.name: NG-Imm Languages VS
resource.description: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines LGA codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs VS
resource.description: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner
resource.description: The owner of an Immunization location

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines Immunization Location Owner.

resource.name: NG-Imm States in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm States VS
resource.description: The state where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Wards VS
resource.description: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG‑Imm Languages in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines codes for major languages spoken across Nigeria.
